Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The id of the pool whose resizing you want to stop.
Additional parameters for the operation
Docs.summary: Stops an ongoing resize operation on the pool.
Docs.remarks: This does not restore the pool to its previous state before the resize operation: it only stops any further changes being made, and the pool maintains its current state.
